remarks: If all the terms of a finite product are nonnegative, so is the product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodge0.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodge0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodge0.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
fprodge0.0leb $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
fprodge0 $p |- ( ph -> 0 <_ prod_ k e. A B ) $.
$d A k $.
